title: Voyager's Nature

Adrian_Keller.emotional_state: Awed and terrified by collective vision, understanding scope of threat
knowledge: Voyager passed through 'thin place' where dimensions intersect
It's being pulled back to Earth
The Change prepares consciousness for existence in thin places
Changed can pool perception into collective vision
Reality will break down when Voyager arrives
Humans must change or be confined to shrinking stable zones
transformation_markers: Can participate in collective gestalt vision
Can perceive across dimensions during pooled vision
Ache from being separate after collective experience

Sera_Volkov.role: Leader of collective vision, interpreter of truth

knowledge: Witnessed Changed performing synchronized collective vision
Heard prophecy of reality breakdown in 18 months
Beginning to question if this is disease or evolution

Colonel_Reeves.emotional_state: Viewing Changed as potential threat to humanity
Colonel_Reeves.role: Escalating threat assessment, reporting up chain

planted_elements.element: Two choices - change or confined to shrinking stable zones

themes_touched: Truth vs. comfort - seeing reality's true nature
Terror of transcendence - being prepared for something incomprehensible
Collective vs. individual - beauty and loss of gestalt consciousness
atmosphere: Cosmic horror revelation, terrible clarity, scale horror
key_images: Reality becoming transparent, seeing through Earth
Voyager as door with thin place spreading like ink
Sera's empty smile after seeing eternity
foreshadowing: Two paths - change or live in shrinking zones
